message_thread.content:
1. Based on the provided data, generate your justifications, ensure that ALL the A and K factors are addressed.
    2. Ensure your responses are structured in JSON format.
    3. Return a full JSON object with all your answers according to the schema.

{
    "KA_Analysis": {
        "K1": "The candidate will respond to a series of short answer questions related to AI-generated script ideation techniques for world-building, storyline and character development, scenario iterations.",
        "A1": "The candidate will perform a practical exercise on analyzing AI output for bias and taking corrective steps and submit their analysis.",
        "K2": "The candidate will respond to questions about copyright law covering Gen AI usage to demonstrate understanding.",
        "A2": "The candidate will utilize NLP techniques and tools to enhance the quality and effectiveness of AI-generated story elements in a practical exam.",
        "K3": "The candidate will answer questions on Gen AI tool limitations and solutions to assess their knowledge.",
        "A3": "The candidate will apply ethical considerations in the selection of prompts and reference usage during a practical exam.",
        "K4": "The candidate will explain awareness and correction of bias in LLMs training data reproduced in output through written responses.",
        "A4": "The candidate will filter and script-edit Gen-AI output in a practical exam to demonstrate their skills.",
        "K5": "The candidate will answer questions on best practices to minimize plagiarism risk to show understanding.",
        "A5": "The candidate will use AI-generated text techniques and methodologies to develop script elements in a practical exam.",
        "K6": "The candidate will respond to questions about AI tools for script analysis and market research to demonstrate knowledge.",
        "A6": "The candidate will apply and adjust relevant prompts in the generative process to improve iterations during a practical exam.",
        "K7": "The candidate will answer questions on Gen AI and ethics awareness to assess their understanding.",
        "A7": "The candidate will identify key terms and themes for input into Gen AI platform to ideate and iterate story elements in a practical exam.",
        "K8": "The candidate will respond to questions on basic NLP techniques and tools relevant to AI text generation to demonstrate knowledge.",
        "A8": "The candidate will incorporate unique creative principles and storytelling elements into AI-generated story ideas during a practical exam.",
        "K9": "The candidate will answer questions on creative principles and storytelling in AI-generated text prompts to assess understanding.",
        "A9": "The candidate will identify copyright risk in Gen-AI production and avoid copyright infringement in a practical exam.",
        "K10": "The candidate will respond to questions on basic AI algorithms and models used in script/text generation to demonstrate knowledge."
    }
}

messages.content:
1. Based on the provided data, generate your justifications, ensure that ALL the A and K factors are addressed.
    2. Ensure your responses are structured in JSON format.
    3. Return a full JSON object with all your answers according to the schema.

{
    "KA_Analysis": {
